location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:503 x 838 mm, on sheet 529 x 923 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint of a map produced as a part of geological survey of Qatar showing roads and routes traversed by motor car and on foot, with location of settlements and wells indicated.Includes references to a ‘Plate III’ (not present in this file) marked as three lines, which comprises geological details.Bottom right-hand corner, below neat line: ‘R-6878’.
